13#ifndef AL_FILE_H
14#define AL_FILE_H
15
16int al_fclose (ee_FILE *fp);
17int al_ferror (ee_FILE *fp);
18int al_feof (ee_FILE *fp);
19void al_clearerr(ee_FILE *fp);
20int al_fileno (ee_FILE *fp);
21int al_fflush (ee_FILE *fp);
22int al_fprintf (ee_FILE *fp, const char* format, ...);
23int al_vfprintf(ee_FILE *fp, const char *format, va_list ap);
24int al_fseek (ee_FILE *fp, long int offset, int whence);
25long al_ftell (ee_FILE *fp);
26
27/* DIRENT routines, and helpers */
28
29int al_stat (const char *path, void * buf);
30int al_lstat (const char *path, void * buf);
31int al_fstat (int fildes, void * buf);
32int al_unlink (const char *filename);
33int al_rename(const char *oldpath, const char *newpath);
34
35/* Basic file I/O routines */
36
37int al_putc (int c, ee_FILE *fp);
38int al_getc (ee_FILE *fp);
39int al_fputs (const char *s, ee_FILE *fp);
40int al_ungetc (int size, ee_FILE *fp);
41char *al_fgets (char *string,int count,ee_FILE *fp);
42size_t al_fread (void *buf, size_t size, size_t count, ee_FILE *fp);
43size_t al_fwrite (const void *buf, size_t size, size_t count, ee_FILE *fp);
44ee_FILE *al_fopen (const char *filename, const char *mode);
45ee_FILE *al_fdopen (int fildes, const char *mode);
46ee_FILE *al_freopen (const char *filename, const char *mode, ee_FILE *fp);
47ee_FILE *al_tmpfile (void);
48char *al_mktemp (char *templat);
49
50#endif /* AL_FILE_H */
